name: Big Time Rush - Elevate
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
My first ever dashboard theme; made with the promo shots for their second album, Elevate.
css: @-moz-document url(http://www.tumblr.com/),                 url-prefix(http://www.tumblr.com/),                  domain(http://www.tumblr.com/)  {    /* CSS rules here apply to:      + The page "http://www.tumblr.com/".     + Any page whose URL begins with "http://www.tumblr.com/"     + Any page whose URL's host is "http://www.tumblr.com/" or ends with        "http://www.tumblr.com/"    */  #dashboard_index, #dashboard_edit_post, #dashboard_submissions, #dashboard_drafts,#dashboard_post_queue, #dashboard_followers, #dashboard_members{background-color:#dcca9e;background-image:url('http://i54.tinypic.com/2l8yd5x.png') !important; background-attachment:fixed !important;background-center:center !important;} #dashboard_index div.l-content, #dashboard_submissions div.l-content, #dashboard_drafts div.l-content,#dashboard_post_queue div.l-content, #dashboard_members div.l-content,  #nav .nav_item .nav_item_nipple .nav_item_nipple_pixel,   #nav .nav_item.active{background: rgba(221, 103,91,0.7) !important;} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photo, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.photoset, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media.video {  background: rgba(106,26,25,0.5);} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_controls_radar_media {background: rgba(106,26,25,0.8) repeat-x 50% 0%;} #right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_suggested_blogs {  background: rgba(106,26,25,0.8);  border: invisible;  }#auto_pagination_loader {background: none;} #dashboard_edit_post{background-color: #ffffff !important}#right_column .dashboard_nav_item {border-bottom:0px solid #eee !important;background-image:none  !important}#right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_nav_title, #right_column .dashboard_nav_item .dashboard_nav_title a,#right_column .dashboard_nav_item a,#right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages,#right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a {color:#fff !important;}#right_column .dashboard_nav_item ul.dashboard_subpages li a.tracked_tag_control {color:#cea952 !important ;}#right_column .dashboard_nav_item #dashboard_controls_radar_media_fold {background: none !important;}#left_column #posts .notification .avatar {border-color:transparent !important;background-color:#9e7c2b !important;opacity:.5 !important;}#left_column #posts .notification .avatar:hover{opacity:1 !important;}.dashboard_switch_blog_menu_header{background-color:#fbfbfb !important;color:#a38f40 !important;}.dashboard_switch_blog_menu_item{background-color:#fbfbfb !important;color:#997b21 !important;border:0px !important}.dashboard_switch_blog_menu_footer{background-color:#fbfbfb !important;color:#9e7c2b !important;}.dashboard_switch_blog_menu_wrapper{background-color:#fbfbfb !important;}#new_post_notice_container{color:#fff !important}#new_post_notice_container a{color:#fff !important}#dashboard_switch_blog_menu_current #dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_and_divider,#dashboard_switch_blog_arrow_current{background-image:none !important}ol#posts li.post.new_post {background: #ffffff url('http://i53.tinypic.com/k9dtmp.png') center center no-repeat;}img[src*="http://assets.tumblr.com/images/new_post_icons_no_labels.png"]{width:0;height:70px;padding-right:250px;opacity: 0;}.new_post_label{font-size:14px !important;padding-top:10px !important;font-family:Georgia, Verdana, sans-serif !important;font-style:italic !important;text-transform: lowercase !important;color:#f9f9f9 !important;letter-spacing:1px !important}#left_column #posts .notification {background-color:#fbfbfb !important;color:#9e7c2b !important;border-bottom-color: #ae9221 !important}#left_column #posts .notification .block {color:#333 !important;}#left_column #posts .notification.alt {background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}#left_column #posts .notification.last_notification,#left_column #posts .notification.single_notification {border-bottom-color:#2f2e2b !important;}#left_column #posts .notification a {color:#1e1b2c !important;border-bottom:0px !important;}#left_column #posts .notification blockquote {border-left-color:#9e7c2b !important;}#left_column #posts .notification .avatar {border-color:transparent !important;background-color:#fbfbfb !important;opacity:0.5 !important;}#left_column #posts .notification .avatar:hover{opacity:1 !important;}.notification_type_icon{display:none !important}/*}
